title: Log Parsing and Incident Timeline
description: Parse web/app/system logs into structured incidents and timelines with anomaly hints.
author: claudepro
content:
# Log Parsing + Incident Timeline

Transform raw logs into incident-focused narratives. Extract key events, group by session/request, and surface anomalies.

## Key Operations
- Pattern extraction and normalization
- Time bucketing and correlation
- Outlier and error surfacing
- Secret redaction

examples.title: Extract errors and build a simple timeline
examples.code:
# Filter 5xx from nginx and sort by time
rg -n ' 5\d\d ' access.log | awk '{print $4, $5, $9, $7}' | sort > timeline.txt
head -n 5 timeline.txt

troubleshooting.issue: No matches due to log format differences
troubleshooting.solution: Adjust patterns for your log format; test with small samples first.
